name: Darn Tough Run Ultra Light Cushion 1/4 Socks - Women's
description: Less is more, and these running socks are lighter than ultralight. Slip them on for training miles in challenging conditions and for your best race-day performance.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and Lycra® for coolness in the summer, warmth in winter.Ultralight cushioning provides comfort without adding weight.Lightweight wool yarn in a ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Darn Tough sources wool from non-mulesed sheep.
